<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2809</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grandpa Henry and the Armchair traveller -lesson plan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Großvater-Henry und der Lehnsesselreisende - 
Lektionplan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Henry de grand-papa et le voyageur de fauteuil - 
plan de leçon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Henry do grandpa e o traveller da poltrona - 
planta da lição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Henry del grandpa ed il viaggiatore della poltrona
- programma di lezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Grandpa Henry και ο ταξιδιώτης πολυθρόνων - 
σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Henrio y el viajero de la butaca - plan del 
grandpa de la lección</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for assessment of a writing activity, where the student is required to write letters with descriptions of where they live. Includes assessment rubric and actual examples..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">descriptive language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">letters</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für Einschätzung einer Schreiben
Aktivität, in der der Kursteilnehmer benoetigt wird, zu schreiben 
Briefe mit Beschreibungen von, denen sie leben. Schließt 
Einschätzung Rubrik und tatsächliche Beispiele ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour l'évaluation d'une 
activité d'écriture, où l'étudiant est requis d'écrire des 
lettres avec des descriptions d'où elles vivent. Inclut la 
rubrique d'évaluation et les exemples réels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para a avaliação de uma 
atividade da escrita, onde o estudante seja requerido escrever letras 
com descrições de onde vivem. Inclui o rubric da avaliação e
exemplos reais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per la valutazione di 
un'attività di scrittura, dove l'allievo è tenuto a scrivere le 
lettere con le descrizioni di dove vivono. Include la rubrica di
valutazione e gli esempi reali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για την αξιολόγηση μιας 
δραστηριότητας γραψίματος, όπου ο σπουδαστής πρέπει για να 
γράψει τις επιστολές με τις περιγραφές όπου ζουν. 
Περιλαμβάνει τη ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης και τα πραγματικά 
παραδείγματα ..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para el gravamen de una 
actividad de la escritura, donde requieren al estudiante escribir 
letras con las descripciones de donde viven. Incluye la rúbrica
del gravamen y ejemplos reales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreibende Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage descriptif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lettres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua descritiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">letras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio descrittivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγραφική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιστολές</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cartas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
